comment: An internal class used for tracking the cursor during parsing of a pattern string.

methods.name: int peek()
methods.comment: Returns the next code point, or -1 if string is too short.

methods.name: int peek2()
methods.comment: Returns the code point after the next code point, or -1 if string is too short.

methods.name: int next()
methods.comment: Returns the next code point and then steps forward.
